trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref> event, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"></xref> event, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event.
The WebPartCancelEventArgs class contains information for several different Web Parts events that can be canceled.

These events include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> events.
The WebPartCancelEventArgs class provides access to the Web Parts control involved in the event.
The Web Parts control is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs.WebPart%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or server or user control) involved in the event.
Gets the Web Parts control involved in the cancelable event.

A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> involved in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event.
